mapper.insert: insert into SSHpro.UserBoard(Sno, Birth, Board) values (#{sno},#{birth},#{board})
mapper.update: update SSHpro.UserBoard set Scores=#{scores} where Sno=#{sno}
mapper.select: select SSHpro.UserBoard.Scores FROM SSHpro.UserBoard WHERE Sno=#{sno}
select SSHpro.UserBoard.IsFinishedQuestion from SSHpro.UserBoard where Sno=#{sno}
select COUNT(*) from SSHpro.UserBoard where IsFinishedQuestion=1
select SSHpro.UserBoard.Scores from SSHpro.UserBoard where IsFinishedQuestion=1
select SSHpro.UserInfo.Sname,SSHpro.UserInfo.Sno from SSHpro.UserInfo where Sno in (select SSHpro.pyq.Sno2 from SSHpro.pyq where Sno1=#{sno})
select COUNT(*) from SSHpro.pyq where Sno1=#{sno}
mapper.delete: delete from SSHpro.pyq where Sno1=#{sno1} and Sno2=#{sno2}; delete from SSHpro.pyq where Sno2=#{sno1} and Sno1=#{sno2}
